name: Lotus IV Infinite Challenge
description:
Hi Guys !!!

Because we must develop an infinite runner as last training test, i decided to base it on the famous Lotus Esprit Challenge game serie on Amiga/Atari.

So, this is it.

Still in development.

Selection with mouse (Only ESPRIT S1 available - "Car 1").

Controles with left joystick (turn right and left), and triggers (right speed up, left brake).

Don't try to go too fast, this is very hard. No car replacing mecanique. If bloqued or out of road, close game and restart.

I repeat : still in development.

(support my job, this is only the beginning !)
